definition: Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei

sentences.english: The Smithsonian Institution also includes the world-famous galleries.
sentences.chinese: 史密森博物院還包括世界著名的藝術館。

sentences.english: Jingshan Park lies right to the north of the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 景山公園坐落在故宮博物院的正北。

sentences.english: The Palace Museum has Chinas richest collection of Ming dynasty lacquer wares.
sentences.chinese: 庋藏於故宮博物院的明代漆器是國內收藏之最。

sentences.english: This painting is a curiosa of small pictures in Song Dynasty, which is collected by the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 《荔枝圖》系故宮博物院珍藏的宋代小品畫之精品。

sentences.english: Now they're in the National Palace Museum. That's my only home.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們就在國立故宮博物院，那兒是我唯一的家。

sentences.english: He works at the Forbidden City and knows a lot about ancient calligraphy and paintings of famous people.
sentences.chinese: 故宮博物院的館員，對古代名人字畫很有研究。

sentences.english: This is a painting that proved to be copied from an original in the Palace Museum in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張已證實是照北京故宮博物院中原畫仿製的畫。

sentences.english: It would be better to change the name to the 'Shameless Museum'.
sentences.chinese: 故宮博物院最好改名爲‘無恥博物院’。

sentences.english: It would be better to change the name to the 'Shameless Museum'.
sentences.chinese: 故宮博物院最好改名爲‘無恥博物院’。

sentences.english: A vase with a similar pattern flanked by a pair of ruyi-cloud handles is in the Palace Museum in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京故宮博物院藏有一造型和紋飾類似的青花雙耳瓶。

sentences.english: Members of the palace museum staff who helped move the artifacts to Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 幫助轉運文物到重慶的故宮博物院工作人員。
北京故宮博物院館藏珍品。

sentences.english: The racket involved the practice of allowing tour groups to bypass the ticket lines.
sentences.chinese: 其中涉及到博物院允許旅遊團繞過檢票口這種做法。

sentences.english: Once displayed in the Forbidden City, it is now in the collection of the Taipei Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 作品原屬故宮舊藏，現存於臺北故宮博物院。

sentences.english: A seal of similar design is in the National Palace Museum in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 臺北故宮博物院藏有一件類似印璽。

definition: Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
Mukden Palace, aka Shenyang Imperial Palace, the main imperial palace during the early years of the Qing dynasty (1625-1644), a secondary palace in subsequent years, now a museum
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
